title: OEReview
description: Collaboratively developed an application to allow students of my college to drop a review about the courses they pursue and allow to select courses wisely..

title: TracknGo
description: Collaboratively developed a bus management system with Next.js, PostgreSQL, Prisma ORM, and NextAuth, featuring fleet tracking, trip scheduling, driver management, and a sleek UI with Tailwind CSS and ShadCN.

title: VidShare
description: Developed a video-sharing platform with Next.js, tRPC, Prisma, and AWS S3, featuring NextAuth authentication, 50MB MP4 upload limits, and optimized storage for seamless content management.
